title: Selma To Montgomery National Historic Trail: Education
body: Education          The Selma to Montgomery National Historic Trail can provide educational programs and materials focusing on Alabama Standards of Learning requirements for grades K-12.  The Selma to Montgomery National Historic Trail offers both indoor classroom style programs and educational outreach programs. Reserved Educational programs are available weekdays from October through May.  For information on how to make a reservation for one of these programs call 334-877-1984
